name: SmartBOY (itch)
description:
What if there were a cartridge for the first GameBOY which make it a smartphone ?! :D

A little game made for the 5th GBJAM !

Use arrow key to navigate in the smartphone; and space to validate.

The game is not finish as you may see; still lacking audio, and the Store and Spotify apps are not done yet.

Also some of the features in the Settings App aren't working well right now.

Still working on the game ;)
